
=head1 NAME

vocabulary

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Duplicate of lexicon, to support /vocabulary resource.

=head1 FIELDS

 lexicon_identifier (character varying) - 
 description (character varying) - 
 url (character varying) - 


=head1 SCHEMA

                        View "gcis_metadata.vocabulary"
        Column       |       Type        | Modifiers | Storage  | Description 
 --------------------+-------------------+-----------+----------+-------------
  lexicon_identifier | character varying |           | extended | 
  description        | character varying |           | extended | 
  url                | character varying |           | extended | 
 View definition:
  SELECT lexicon.identifier AS lexicon_identifier,
     lexicon.description,
     lexicon.url
    FROM lexicon;
 

=cut
